name: Nemo Stargaze Luxury 2.0 Chair
description: Short on campsite trees? Someone always snagging your hammock? Kick back in Nemo’s Stargaze Luxury Chair. It’s suspended, letting you swing as though you were in a hammock. Aluminum supports eliminate that sinking feeling. Auto-reclining hardware adds support in upright or reclined positions. Toss it in the trunk and bring it car camping or to a BBQ in the park; it works on most terrain. A cup holder and pocket keep your drink and headphones handy.Auto-reclining hardware helps you find the perfect position, keeping you supported and relaxed.Long backrest and adjustable headrest add extra support for people big and small.Backrest is supported with 2 small shock-corded aluminum poles.Comfortable swinging design works on nearly any terrain, unlike a rocking chair.Monofilament mesh is cooling and non-absorbent so it won't retain water.Cup holder and small pocket keep necessities close at hand.Bottom of chair sits 30.5cm above the ground.Wide aluminum frame with machined hubs for extra support over polymer hubs.Padded carrying case.
